Package entity

package entity
  • Class
    Description
    DecorEntity
    The DecorEntity class represents a non-living decorative entity in the game.
    DecorType
    The DecorType enum represents different types of decorative entities in the game.
    Direction
    The Direction enum represents the possible movement directions for entities in the game.
    Entity
    The Entity class represents a generic entity in the game with a location, weight, direction, type, and sprite manager.
    EntityLoader
    The EntityLoader class is responsible for loading entities from a file and adding them to the entity manager.
    ItemEntity
    The ItemEntity class represents a non-living entity that contains an item.
    LivingEntity
    The LivingEntity class represents a living entity in the game with various attributes such as health, armor, strength, and magic.
    Monster
    The Monster class represents a monster entity in the game, which is a type of LivingEntity.
    MonsterType
    The MonsterType enum represents different types of monsters in the game and their corresponding inventory items.
    NonLivingEntity
    The NonLivingEntity class represents a non-living entity in the game.
    NPC
    The NPC class represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game.
    NPCType
    The NPCType enum represents different types of NPCs in the game and their corresponding attributes.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player character in the game.
